known_issues: Industry 4.0 card is missing from the Solutions page.

existing_features.title: Add an "Industry 4.0" solution card to the Solutions page, using the same design/layout as existing Solution cards and using the same title/description/icon/content as the Home page "Our Solutions" Industry 4.0 element; ensure it appears at the end of the Solutions grid when viewing /solutions with default filters.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add an Industry 4.0 solution card to the Solutions page, matching the existing Solution card design and using the same content as the Home page 'Our Solutions' Industry 4.0 element; place it at the end.
Rename the currently selected element to "About Us".
Update the text content of the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h1[1]/span[1] to exactly: "About Us".

projectName: Rename selected heading text to “About Us” and add Industry 4.0 to Solutions page
